name: typemill
description: Typemill is a self-hosted flat-file CMS optimized for documentation and small websites. It provides a Markdown editor, navigation management, and themes through a straightforward web interface.
features: Flat-file storage: Store content in Markdown files without requiring a database for simplicity.
Markdown editor: Write and edit content using Markdown with live preview and formatting toolbar.
Navigation management: Organize pages in hierarchical structures with drag-and-drop reordering.
Theme system: Customize appearance with themes or create your own for unique designs.
Plugin support: Extend functionality with plugins for forms, galleries, and other features.
Documentation focus: Optimized for creating documentation sites with version control and search.
User management: Support multiple authors with role-based permissions for content management.
Media library: Upload and manage images and files through a built-in media manager.
SEO-friendly: Generate SEO-optimized pages with customizable meta tags and clean URLs.
Version control: Track content changes with Git integration for collaborative editing.
Responsive design: Deliver mobile-friendly websites that work on all devices automatically.
Simple deployment: Deploy easily on any web server with PHP support and minimal requirements.
